OOC: have you noticed that exist more Predacons than Maximals????

Perceptor::

Peceptor Opended fire against Owlhawk

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "catmastero" <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> Inferno fired an energy blast at Owlhawk's cannon to try and mess 
up 
> his aim "You shall never harm the queen!" he exclaimed angerly.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > OOC: Where's know where?  Is that a town for nerds or
> > something?  Is it close to the Predicon base then? 
> > Lol.
> > 
> > BIC:  Sunhawk dodges taking one plasma blast to one of
> > his Owl wings.  He lands and transforms facing
> > Megatron.  His chest opens, and a canon comes out.
> > 
> > Owlhawk:  THIS Megatron is the Vok Destroyer.  Once
> > you get hit by it you will be infected  with a
> > virtually incurable virus causing your spark to slowly
> > break down over several months as you experience
> > increasingly common spasms of pain.
> > 
> > He doesn't move or show any sign he's in pain from his
> > wing as he says this, although the sparks comming from
> > his wing make it very clear.  He fires the Vok
> > Destroyer at Megatron.
> > 
> > OOC: Hey rAuq do me a favor and start a poll to see if
> > "I am your angel of death" would have been a better
> > intruduction, although Megatron as I recall had a
> > tendancy to talk during battle, so he wouldn't shoot
> > until the speach was over anyway (unless you intend to
> > change him) regardless of how long it took.
> > 
> > 
> > --- x_rauq_x <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> > > ooC: Ahhh! Azure's no-post session kinda messed me
> > > up as far as

> > > much caught up. 
> > > (I personally don't like asking the group for a
> > > recap, better that I 
> > > do it myself.) =)
> > > 
> > > Would anyone mind if I had Switchblade trigger the
> > > artifact, and 
> > > make a laser like beam come out of it, slashing a
> > > hole through the 
> > > side of the Predacon base, and slicing by Owlhawk,
> > > Megatron, Tyrael, 
> > > (and some others?)
> > > 
> > > -- Megatron --
> > > 
> > > Megatron's energon axe was poised to come down on
> > > Tyrael as 
> > > Owlhawk's plasma cannon flared out of know where,
> > > smashing into his 
> > > shoulder, knocking him to the ground. 
> > > 
> > > "Ahh yes..." says Megatron to himself as he gets up,
> > > "It seems this 
> > > Maximal has Predacon tendancies. That was a brillian
> > > backstab." He 
> > > winces as his checks the damage to his left arm.
> > > Still functional.
> > > 
> > > "In that case, I'd be flattered to play with him."
> > > Megatron's 
> > > weapons phase out of subspace and the target
> > > Owlhawk. He immediately 
> > > launches a rocket, followed by two plasma blasts.
